replies.bodyText:
yes is to correct this Error UserServiceTest.getAllUsers_shouldNotContainsAnyDuplicateUsers:680 expected: <11> but was: <12>
for now
replies.author: achilep

replies.bodyText: Do you mean that we get this error on JUnit 5 but not JUnit 4?
replies.author: teleivo

replies.bodyText: please remove this file from the PR. tests for it on JUnit 5 are green on Bamboo and the Travis CI build on master https://travis-ci.org/github/openmrs/openmrs-core/builds/708421471
replies.author: teleivo

replies.bodyText: also see my suggestions you added some lines that have to be removed.
replies.author: teleivo

TRUNK-6028 UserServiceTest pass on MySQL
